privacyPolicy.title: Privacy Policy
privacyPolicy.statementP: According to the General Data Protection Regulation, the personal data controller of a register is obligated to inform the register’s data subjects in a clear manner.
privacyPolicy.inquiries: Contact information in matters related to personal data files:
privacyPolicy.dataSubjectsDesc: Persons included in the register customers.
privacyPolicy.purpose: 3. Purpose of Use of Personal Data
privacyPolicy.rightsP: Customers have the right to access, rectify, delete, and object to their data processing.
privacyPolicy.sourcesP: Collected from customers via forms, emails, and online sources.
privacyPolicy.disclosureP: Not disclosed for marketing purposes outside Café Boardgame Oy.
privacyPolicy.durationP: Personal data is processed as long as necessary for the customer relationship.
privacyPolicy.processorsP: Employees and third-party services process data securely.
privacyPolicy.transferP: No data is transferred outside the EU or EEA.
privacyPolicy.decisionMakingP: No automatic decision-making or profiling is done.
